question: Dhodro Banam:
option1: is a distinctive folk dance of Rajputs of Rajasthan
option2: is a single-string musical instrument used by Santal tribes of Odisha
option3: is the oldest form of martial art in India
option4: is the only surviving specimen of the ancient Sanskrit theatre
answer: is a single-string musical instrument used by Santal tribes of Odisha
explanation: Dhodro banam is a single-string musical instrument used by the Santal tribes in Odisha.
